Name: mid_year
Comment: if end.year=start.year assign end.year; if end.year-start.year=1 assign end.year; if end.year-start.year=2 calculate mid point of the interval; discuss if survey over 3/5/7/etc years

Name: age_min_anthro_F
Description: study design age range female minimum

Name: age_max_anthro_F
Description: study design age range female maximum

Description: study design age range male minimum

Name: age_max_anthro_M
Description: study design age range male maximum

Description: study design age range female minimum

Description: study design age range female maximum

Description: study design age range male minimum

Name: age_max_glu_M
Description: study design age range male maximum

Description: study design age range female minimum

Description: study design age range female maximum

Description: study design age range male minimum

Name: age_max_chol_M
Description: study design age range male maximum

Name: age_max_bp_F
Description: study design age range female maximum

Description: study design age range male minimum

Description: study design age range male maximum

Description: study design age range female minimum

Description: study design age range female maximum

Description: study design age range male minimum

Description: study design age range male minimum

Description: study design age range female minimum

Name: age_max_othblood_F
Description: study design age range female maximum

Description: study design age range male minimum

Description: study design age range male maximum

Name: excluded
Description: if a survey is decided to be excluded completely from all four risk factors

Name: is_urban_all
Description: place of residence (with all levels coded as original)

Name: is_pregnant_exam
Description: pregnancy indicator (during physical exam, if different from the previous one)

Name: new_in_cohort
Description: (for cohort studies only) if participants in follow-up were newly recruited

Name: unit_height
Comment: "cm"; if inches convert to cm, multiply by 2.54; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude height

Name: unit_sitting_height
Comment: "cm"; if inches convert to cm, multiply by 2.54; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude height

Name: unit_weight
Comment: "kg"; if pounds convert to kg, multiply by 0.454; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude weight

Name: unit_waist
Comment: "cm"; if inches convert to cm, multiply by 2.54; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude waist

Name: unit_hip
Comment: "cm"; if inches convert to cm, multiply by 2.54; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude hip

Name: unit_skin
Comment: "cm"; if inches convert to cm, multiply by 2.54; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude

Name: unit_gl
Comment: "mmol/L", "mg/dl"; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude fasting glucose

Name: fasting_time
Comment: actual fasting time (in hours) if available

Name: is_plasma
Description: Glucose measurements were based on plasma or blood
Comment: 1=plasma, 0=whole blood; lab analysis = 1; could be device-specific, if different devices were used

Name: is_plasma_ppg
Description: OGTT measurements were based on plasma or blood

Name: unit_ppg
Comment: "mmol/L", "mg/dl"; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude postprandial glucose

Name: unit_hba1c
Comment: "%"; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude ha1c; use "unit_ha1c" in extraction

Name: self_diab_12mos
Description: self-reported diabetes only in the last 12 months

Name: drug_diab
Description: use of diabetes drug, includnig insulin and pills

Name: device_gl
Comment: "Lab" for laboratory analysis, i.e. not a portable device

Name: device_hba1c
Comment: "Lab" for laboratory analysis, i.e. not a portable device; use "device_ha1c" in extraction

Name: unit_tc
Comment: "mmol/L", "mg/dl"; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude total chlesterol

Name: unit_hdl
Comment: "mmol/L", "mg/dl"; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude HDL

Name: ldl_direct
Comment: if both measured and calculated LDL exist

Name: unit_ldl
Comment: "mmol/L", "mg/dl"; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude LDL

Name: unit_trg
Comment: "mmol/L", "mg/dl"; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude triglyceride

Name: self_chol_12mos
Description: self-reported dyslipidemia only in last 12 months

Name: drug_chol_class
Description: ATC classifications of cholesterol lowring medication

Name: is_serum
Description: Lipids measured in serum or plasma

Name: device_lipids
Description: Device name for lipids measurement (lab or handheld)

Name: method_tc
Description: Method used to measure TC (enzymatic, extraction etc)

Name: method_hdl_sep
Description: Method used for HDL separation (Heparin-Manganese, Dextran sulphate-Magnesium, polyethylene glycol, etc)

Name: method_hdl_quan
Description: Method used for HDL quantification (enzymatic etc)

Name: is_ldl_calc
Description: Whether LDL was calcualted or measured directly
Comment: 1 for calcualted with Friedewald equation, 0 for direct LDL assay measurement

Name: is_ldl_fasting
Description: Whether LDL was based on fasting sample by design
Comment: 1 for fasting, 0 for non-fasting; used to clean LDL and TRG measurements

Name: is_ldl_standard
Description: LDL standardisation programme (not standardised, CDC/CRMLN, WHO, etc.)

Name: is_multi_bp
Description: If multiple BP measurements were available

Name: device_bp
Description: Device name for blood pressure measurement
Comment: if name not specified, use "mercury", "oscillometric" or "aneroid" instead; if still not specified, code as missing

Name: is_multi_cuff
Description: If mutilple cuff sizes were available for BP measurement

Name: averaged_properly
Description: When only averaged BP is available with multiple measured in a survey, the average was not taken as per our protocol, i.e. dropping the first and averaging the rest

Name: unit_bp
Comment: "mmHg"; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude blood pressure; added during merging

Name: self_hyper_12mos
Description: self-reported hypertension only in the last 12 months (only in STEPS/STEPS-like surveys)

Name: smoke_num_curr
Comment: number of cigerettes smoked per day currently

Name: is_crea_idms
Description: Whether creatinine measurements were calibrated to IDMS

Name: drug_kidney_class
Description: ATC classifications of kidney disease medication

Name: ast
Description: Aspartate transaminase (AST) or glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase (SGOT)

Name: alt
Description: Alanine transaminase (ALT) or serum glutamate-pyruvate transaminase (SGPT)

Name: self_liver
Comment: String: describe the definition of liver disease

Name: drug_liver_class
Description: ATC classifications of liver disease medication

Name: unit_platelet
Comment: "1000 cells/uL"; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude

Name: samplewt_blood
Description: Wts for anemia and inflamatory markers

Name: unit_rbc
Comment: "1000 cells/uL"; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude

Name: unit_wbc
Comment: "1000 cells/uL"; code "EXCLUDE" if decided to exclude
